main event: A farmer in Circleville, Ohio observed a saucer-shaped object hovering above the buildings on February 1, 1948.
interesting points: The object was about sixty feet in diameter and ten to twelve feet thick,It had a metallic appearance and a dome from which blinding orange light shone,The object's position suggested someone inside was curious about the glow from the farm windows,The light changed to a dim amber before the object disappeared from view,This incident was part of reports of mysterious white balls of light and parachute descents in the Rouen, France area.
witness description: the owner of a big modern farm
